tool_description: Slices an stl file and return basic information about the print
name: STL slicer
title: STL slicer

api_list.name: Get information on STL file
api_list.description:
Post an stl file in the body using form-data and recieve basic information regarding the 3D print. Try it out in Postman, as it does not work with a binary post (a regular file post is not supported in the RapidAPI UI).
There is also a working example in Python in the about/README section.

optional_parameters.name: file
optional_parameters.description: Try it out in Postman or the Python Example in the About/README section, as it does not work with a binary post (a regular file post is not supported in the RapidAPI UI).
